choices: Choose Sabrina Diamond and find the microchip
Choose Lorelei Banksia and visit the motel
Spy on Katie Madrid and try to rescue Jared
1.content:
A secret agent wearily unattachs his bungee cord as he trods into the Agency. The secretary looks at him.
"Agent M42, you have a new mission," says Questa-Maria who was testing her gadgets.
"What is it madam?" M42 says wearily, unbuckling his cord,
"We have a new target," Questa-Maria says.
"What's our new target," Agent M42 says questioningly as he adjusts his belt buckle.
"You have to spy on several ladies in the district, you get to choose between Lorelei Banksia, Sabrina Diamond, Katie Madrid, or we can choose another spy to do the mission."

"Details please," rasps M42 wheezily.
"Well Sabrina happens to be a someone who is Asian looking with a ponytail and glasses, and she has our floppy disk stolen from our headquarters. I need you to use this device that helps you sneak in all tiny like a fly on the wall." Questa-Maria continues talking about the two other missions
"Lorelei Banskia is a hip young 35 year old model who does singing lessons in her spare time and listens to pop music and if you choose to do her mission, you will need to find a specific folder that was stolen from us which is located on the 23rd floor of the Motel Constantinople. Katie Madrid is a 18 year old lady who is going to university, but has actually abducted a fellow agent by the name of Jared Coltane."
1.title: The spy of Memphis

11.content:
Sabrina Diamond has a sneaky expression as she enters a password into a computer, she has nerdy glasses and a cheeky expression on her face as she flicks her black hair. She is slightly chubby and as she glances in your direction, you note that she seems a little on the short side, though your confirmations are allayed when you notice her martial arts degree in Kung-Fu, though it could be an elaborate hoax

As she types into a computer, you notice she was hacking into the mainframe and you see a flash-drive as the floppy disk is reinserted.
11.title: Choose Sabrina Diamond

choices: I'll go through her body to see what I can learn from her
I'll force her to divulge the info
112.content:
You dive into her drink hoping to explore her body and find out vital information from the inside of her. Some of the gadgets you had were suited for inner body exploration so you prepared yourself for her to drink you up. Eventually she picked up the coffee mug and... "GUUUUUULLLLPPP!" You heard as she took her next sip unaware that you were inside her belly. She was rubbing it well.

Meanwhile you contacted the agency to tell them you were inside her and could get info from her or control her. You told the agency..
112.title: Dive into her coffee cup

choices: Scan the rest of Sabrina's main organs
1121.content:
You pet the shaking walls of the unstable organ as you report to the local agency that you'll have to retrieve information from her very organs, maybe you would have to venture through the depths of her organs to find the information were from this interesting lady... Or possibly if you could even make it out in one piece. In the dripping darkness all you can hear is a soft heartbeat and more sloshing noises as you wait. You could use one of your other gadgets to help you at this point... You hear a loud rumbling as the walls shake.

By getting your high-technologicl scanner out, you start scanning the area as it glows a neon-green and lights up the place. You also see an exit tunnel as it slurps open...
1121.title: I'll check this out

choices: Point your scanner upwards, toward her brain
Point it to the sides, towards the gall bladder
11213.content:
Using your hi-tech scanner, you survey Sabrina's stomach -- every square-inch of it -- but find no meaningful information in this particular organ. You now turn a dial to boost the scanner's power, enabling it to search OTHER organs in this lady's body...

But where should you look?!
11213.title: Data Search

112132.content:
You aim your scanning device to the sides of Sabrina's stomach, and quickly you hear rapid beeping -- your scanner must be picking up something from the gall bladder!

In a hot-and-cold-styled search, you survey your organic prison until the beeping reaches its fastest rate, with you near the closest stomach wall to the gall bladder. Analyzing this organ with your hi-tech device, you discover...
112132.title: Inner-Body Scanning

choices: Bang on the walls, try to make Sabrina sick
1121321.content:
Scanning the gall bladder of your unaware host, you are shocked to discover files...possibly emails...sent by Sabrina to some mysterious client. It would seem that Sabrina is working with some goons to learn the secrets of human shrinkage and use it to thwart her client's foes...while making herself some easy money.

You've got to escape this stomach and warn your superiors about this.
1121321.title: Shocking Secrets

11213211.content: Deciding that banging on the stomach walls will only alert Sabrina to enemy presence, you opt instead to let nature run its course. You leap down a moderately small hole in the stomach floor and find yourself in a thin tunnel - the small intestine. Making your way through Sabrina's bowels, you...
11213211.title: The Natural Way

choices: Stick around to see what else she has
112132111.content: With nothing in your way, you reach Sabrina's rectum. Walking towards her anus, you push against it, alerting your host of your presence. Feeling something at her rear end, Sabrina rubs her belly and leans to the side. "pppprrrrrrtttt!" A small gust of flatulence exits her bum and with a sigh, Sabrina sits down again and continues her work. Meanwhile, you turn to hear some rumbling coming your way, and a smelly gale forces you out of the rectum. The force was so great, that it shot you out of her panties and pants and a several centimeters (Miles to you, due to your small size). Picking yourself up, you turn to see that Sabrina hasn't noticed you at all and using that to your advantage, you email the data to your boss, back at home. Once you completed the task, you debate on what to do next.
112132111.title: ...exit through the back door.

112132112.content:
Navigating through the thin, dark tunnel of Sabrina's small intestine, you eventually collide with something solid. Something you can't seem to get past.

What could it be?
112132112.title: Something in the Way

1121321123.content: You find a weird cell-like organism in your way
1121321123.title: A weird cell

choices: ...drinks some water to settle her tummy.
11213212.content:
Not wanting to take the natural exit from Sabrina's body, you pound and kick relentlessly at the rubbery walls of her stomach, hoping to make her sick so that she'll puke you up.

Indeed, the giantess's work is interrupted when she feels a sharp pain in her abdomen. Feeling like she's about to lose her lunch, she...
11213212.title: Sickening Sabrina's Stomach

112132122.content: Sabrina just makes a sigh sound as she glanced around the room, seeing a large ceramic brown and white jug filled with some clean water. At this she makes a happy and excited noise before she gets a tall and empty glass. She pours herself half a glass of the transparent water. What happens next?
112132122.title: Sabrina sighs and drinks some water

choices: You are pulled into the intestines, alive
1121321221.content:
Sabrina guzzles down the water in her glass in an effort to ward off her stomachache. Putting the glass down afterward, she rubs her belly and smiles, feeling surprisingly quick relief.

As you struggle in the giantess's gut, you are unprepared for the sudden torrent that rains down upon you. Thoroughly soaked and cold, you can no longer put up much of a fight, and fall back in defeat.
1121321221.title: Making a Splash

choices: Uhh...anyone ELSE willing to spy on Sabrina?
11213212211.content:
Unfortunately, you fall right into a nearby pool of stomach acid. The green, corrosive liquid quickly begins to eat away at your skin, and you black out in seconds, thankfully BEFORE the rest of your body is dissolved.

Sabrina, meanwhile, feels her stomach growl faintly. Whatever caused her stomachache earlier, it must be finished off by now. If only she knew she'd eaten a tiny spy...
11213212211.title: Mission Failed

choices: ...you get to the anus without trouble
11213212212.content:
As you fall back in exhaustion, you fail to notice where you're heading, and find yourself being sucked through a small hole in the stomach floor before entering a thin tunnel. This must be Sabrina's small intestine. Not the most pleasant way out, but it'll have to work.

As you navigate through the giantess's bowels...
11213212212.title: Alive, but not free yet.

choices: Climb up with a grappling hook
Pound the walls of Sabrina's stomach
What CAN you do but accept fate?
112133.content:
Before you can continue your search of Sabrina's organs for some vital intel, you hear a beastly gurgle all around you, and you see the acid lake nearby begin bubbling. Digestion is starting! You've got to get out of this death trap.

What's a shrunken spy to do?
112133.title: Mission Abort!

1121333.content:
Your organic prison rumbles louder and more forceful, throwing you off balance and into the nearby lake of digestive juices. The bubbling acids make quick work of your gear, then your clothes...then your skin...followed by the rest of your puny body. In mere moments, nothing discernible remains of you.

Sabrina, meanwhile, rubs her belly as she feels it gurgle and digests that coffee. If only she'd known that a tiny spy was along for the ride...

Fate is a rather cruel thing...
1121333.title: Fate's a Cruel Thing

11213331.content:
After some time, you slowly awaken, somehow still in the same room. Strangely, you can't move...or see any part of your body! Suddenly you feel a hand rubbing you, and it's a bizarre sensation.

Then it becomes clear: you've been digested and turned into a semi-conscious part of Sabrina's abdominal muscles! Desperate, you realize that Sabrina might be able to fix this, if you can get her attention. Despite your best efforts, all you can manage is weak jiggling in the skin of her abs.

Does Sabrina notice this?
11213331.title: The fate of a tiny spy

choices: You stunned her with the device
1122.content: "I'll force her to tell me the information I desperately need for infiltration" you told the agency as you splash around in the arcid acids as the internal cave wobbles. You see by the dim light of the neon watch that you could see the time flash 15:30. You open your watch, by flipping a contained green button which spat out a miniature cord and hook attached. "Right, I'll have to use my harpoon gun to attach this..."
1122.title: I'll force her to divulge the info

11221.content:
I need to climb out of her stomach and into her head. So I'll aim this outside of her oesophagus, then climb it and her head all the way to her brain. Just as the agent fired and said "Perfect hit!" Sabrina felt a sharp jolt and walked towards the drinks dispenser and got more coffee, thinking that this computer is being too difficult for her.

As Sabrina drunk each sip of her coffee the spy inside her was thrown about and causing her aches and pains. When the spy finally got to her oesophagus he got out his jetpack did he make it to her brain?
11221.title: You climb the rope

112211.content:
As the spy started to fly up the oesophagus and past Sabrina's trachea, Sabrina started to feel off colour and went to have a glass of water. Fortunately he had made it above the uvula and was still climbing until he reached her brain. Now that he was in Sabrina's brain he thought he would let her know so he walked to her left ear and said to her "Sabrina, you are going to tell me everything you know or I will extract it from your brain, I can connect my gadgets to your body now what info have you got?"

Sabrina was understandably worried, she never had this kind of problem before. She didn't want to risk losing all of her treasured memories in an instant, so she willingly complied. Sabrina said "Alright I will tell you everything! Let me type it all up onto a document, just leave my body, and I will leave.

"Are you sure?" asked the spy who was suspicious about her. "Yes" said Sabrina with tears in her eyes. "Alright now print out that document, and quit crying!" said the spy to Sabrina. Sabrina printed the document and as the spy went into her tear duct, she grabbed him and put him in another latte, but this time she took his gadgets away. The spy was mortified and yelled "You tricked me!!" Sabrina said "No! This is for that stomach-ache I had whilst you were still in there, enjoy your new home!" She drank him along with the latte and continued with her work- along with a spy powerless to stop her inside her.

The End
112211.title: Yes.

choices: Get inside her body through a different entrance
Shrink down and look at what's on the computer
Walk away and jam her signal from afar
113.content:
A few more options come to mind...

The coffee is a good choice to get inside but as well can be dangerous...there's plenty more open spots to get inside her and get some form of information, however the human body is both fun and dangerous

You can walk away, shrink down, and sneak onto her desk to see what's shes up to. However getting caught will obviously be squished spy...and a possible snack.

You can walk away and try to disrupt the signal. However it can risk your location exposure and important information to be spilled out.
113.title: Well??

choices: You Choose Sabrina's Nose and Enter Her Brain
You Choose Sabrina's Toe (via. a cut) and investigate her own Medical Stats
You Choose Sabrina's Ear and try to influence her
1131.content: You decide to plan out how to get inside Sabrina as you pace back and forth, looking at a human body map of twisting veins, small lungs and a detailed digestive system, this shouldn't be too hard, but this is an unique case, what with all the medical records of short-sightedness, slow digestion. After a few minutes of denial, excitement, and cowardly to manly ego shifting, you arrive at your conclusions at what to do.
1131.title: Get inside her body through a different entrance

choices: Sabrina gets a call on her phone- Agent 42 has to answer it as her...
42 decides to have some fun with Sabrina's mind...
11311.content:
Agent 42, shrunk down to around 1mm tall, moved slowly and carefully under the cover of Sabrina's arms as she typed away on the computer. The plan was simple, sneak inside her body through the nose, hijack her brain and get as much information from her as possible, the first of which being the method in which she got this disk in the first place. Simple, easy and 100% covert.

However, that was out of the question now. 42 looked over at the monitor, just a quick glance. He was alarmed to that the young hacker had broken through the fire walls, she was now downloading the Agency files and preparing to upload them to an unknown database. The time for stealth and caution was over, now it was time for reckless force... 42's favorite kind.

He dived out from under the young woman's arm, the cybernetic mask unfolding from his suit's neckline to cover his face and eyes. As he landed back on his feet directly under Sabrina's nose, 42 turned on his booster pack and rocketed up at her face. Sabrina caught the movement out of the corner of her blank eye and turned to the tiny black speck flying at her. She had only enough time to realize where it was going, a look of dread replacing that sneaky smile from before, as Agent 42 flew up her nose and disappeared inside her own head.

He moved quickly, passing through the moist and humid tunnel of Sabrina's left nostril. As soon as the tunnel leveled out, and he was sure he was deep enough inside that she couldn't blow him out, 42 turned off his boosters and ran the rest of the way. The tunnel was pitch black, though he could see where he was going thanks to the map images and the night vision of his own mask. He didn't need it for long as a new light appeared at the end of the tunnel. 42 shot through the end and found himself inside a giant organic chamber illuminated by brilliant arches of multicolored electricity. The blue-light was coming from the giant, pink mound of wrinkled flesh in the center of the large chamber, Sabrina's brain. Wasting no time, Agent 42 loaded up a special probe into his dart gun, took aim at the large, pulsing brain and fired...

Sabrina sat in her chair, a bit of panic now setting in. What was that tiny thing that went up her nose? A bug? She'd never seen a bug fly that fast, or had any memory of seeing a flying bug in her room recently. Her recent panic turned to alarm as she saw some of the plans still loaded on her computer... They were plans for private shrinking tech, a number of other devices such as jet packs, weapons, and even prototypes for cerebral technology! What if the thing wasn't a bug? What if it was a machi-

She was cut off from her thought as some kind of powerful surge overtook her. It was like her mind was being overwhelmed with energy or something. All of her thoughts went blank, all her own fears forgotten. Indeed, Sabrina remembered nothing from the last 20 minutes as she fell into blackness, a deep sleep taking her. In the outside world, Sabrina's body twitched for a few seconds before sitting upright in her chair, unmoving and silent while looking straight ahead.

Sabrina was now fully under Agent 42's full control...
11311.title: Hacking the hacker

choices: Agent 42 hangs up on Sabrina's boss
113111.content:
Suddenly as Agent 42 was pondering the mysteries of life, there was a sudden tune of the 'Blue Danube' as suddenly there was a dial-tone noise as it beeps cheerfully. Agent 42 was hesitant to call back, but there was a gruff male voice as he heard someone say...
"Hello? Sabrina, ah I see, have you acquired the microchip already?" spoke Sabrina's boss who was waiting for an answer. Agent 42 sits on the pink brain as the dart twitched mildly, he could see how the dart could influence the movements and he had an idea...
113111.title: A phone rings

choices: Make her speak another non-fictional language
113112.content: Agent 42 thought that this was a brilliant opportunity not to miss... What does he do while he is in the brain of Sabrina?
113112.title: 42 decides to have some fun with Sabrina's...

choices: His puch causes something to happen...
Notthing happens. 42 Makes Sabrina travel to the agency with him in control...
1131121.content:
The connection was established and Agent 42 had complete control over Sabrina's body. He quickly turned on his wrist computer and linked it with the probe. A live feed of the outside world through Sabrina's eyes popped up on the screen. He was able to see everything she saw, and what he saw alarmed him more. The upload of his company files on her computer was 95% complete, he had to act fast. Wasting no time, he typed in his own commands, and watched as Sabrina's body reacted.

The young girl's hijacked brain forced her arms to grab hold of the computer's Ethernet cable and quickly yang it out, cutting off the internet connection and stop the upload. An error message appeared on the screen, 'Connection Lost. Upload Aborted'. 42 sighed in relief, as he sat down against the pulsing flesh of Sabrina's brain.

It had been too close. How could such a young girl with no hacker record get so close to all of their secrets? Sabrina wasn't even on any of their hacker watch lists, and yet she nearly made their entire organization public, a veritable death sentence for any spy organization. He had to find out and now was as good a time as any. With the probe in her brain, Sabrina would do anything 42 programmed her to do. Run outside naked, curse out a cop, even reveal all her own secrets. Like who helped her, and where she was sending the information.

42 stood again, facing the brain as he typed on his wrist computer. He hacked into Sabrina's auditory sections of the brain and her vocal center, allowing him to make her talk and hear it clearly through her ears. He then activated the mic on his computer and began issuing commands by voice.

"Sabrina Diamond. You are now under my control and forced to do as I command. That includes answering questions I address to you truthfully and without delay. Do you understand?"

"Sey. I dnatsrednu." Sabrina spoke with a monotone voice, the least strange thing about her response.

42 just stared at his computer. "What the hell?"

"I ma ot dnopser yllufhturt dna tuohtiw yaled."

The tiny man dragged his hand down his face as he began to understand what was wrong. For some reason, Sabrina was answering him as requested but with all her words said backwards. It suddenly crossed his mind that the probe was actually still in the developmental stages and might have a few problems.

"Ok," he said into the mic again. "Just hold on a moment and let me fix this up a bit." He typed away the keypad, making adjustments here and there. A few time these changes had the odd the side effect of making Sabrina twitch a little as the probe seemed to shock her brain as the commands were entered.

"Alright." 42 said finally. "Lets try this. Repeat after me: I am Sabrina Diamond and I am under your control."

Sabrina's response was less than satisfactory. "Sabrina I and am I Diamond under am control your."

42's eye twitched. "Alright, how about this?" He typed again, this time with a little frustration in his motions. Again Sabrina twitched as he screwed with her brain.

"Now try again. Tell me your name and age." 42 ordered.

"Koko ga wo Nani Sakura baka no ebi."

He was about ready to pull his hair out now. "Oh come on! You're not even Japanese. I doubt that was even a real sentence."

42 was really annoyed now. In his frustration, the tiny agent pulled back and slammed his fist into the soft squishy flesh of Sabrina's brain...
1131121.title: Sabrina speaks in tongues.

11311211.content: Things slowed down in 42's head as his fist made perfect contact to Sabrina's tender brain. His fist was ingulfed as his wrist and part of his forearm, pushing through the sticky and wet inner flesh. As reality struck him as hard as the jockstrap incident years ago, 42 cursed under his breath. "Damnit" he told himself and his lack of self control led to a light kick to her brain. Sabrina's brain was quick to register the stimulation and static begun to wash through her head and electricity flowed from her centeral nervous system into the rest of her body..
11311211.title: Fist of Fury and Failure!

choices: Sabrina throws her computer to the side, nearly hitting her boss
The probe loses it's influence over Sabrina
113112111.title: Options 1/2

choices: The boss is angry with Sabrina
1131121111.content: In a swift movement, Sabrina loses control of her cortex and there was a loud clang as she threw her computer like an Olympic discus thrower. Unfortunately, she almost hits the boss who looked astounded as his employer regained her composure at this. "I'm sorry." Agent M42 apologised through Sabrina's larynx as she sighs loudly. Agent M42 feels weird as he realised that with his fist literally through her brain that the micro could literally control her movements.
1131121111.title: KLANG! Sabrina throws her computer

choices: Agent 42 senses literally everything Sabrina's body is doing...
The probe gains complete control over Sabrina
113112112.content: As Agent 42 stands there engulfed in brain electricity, something strange rather happened as the pink jelly of the brain wobbled and felt like buttered toast to the confused agent... He waited as he stared at his digital watch, still connected to the brain's nerves interlocking the arm.
113112112.title: Options 3/4

choices: Agent 42 commands Sabrina to stop dancing
1131122.content: Suddenly as Agent 42 presses the button, there was a whirling sensation as Sabrina began to robotically dance the polka with music flowing out of nowhere.
1131122.title: Sabrina dances to the polka

choices: Agent 42 shoves his hands into Sabrina's brain
Sabrina is forced to embarrass herself
11311222.content: And there's more to do, after all...
11311222.title: Other...

choices: Agent 42 gets teleported into Sabrina's mind
113112221.content: Agent 42 had thought of a most excellent idea indeed. As he waits around he saw the pink and wrinkly brain walls were quite malleable and soft. Without a word, he delved his gloved hands right into the walls of Sabrina's brain as blue electricity dances around his gloves.
113112221.title: Agent 42 shoves his hands into Sabrina's brain

1131122211.content: Agent 42 lands with a thud. He was in a technological city with lots of people walking around. It was rather busy, with electrical cables running around the city. They looked like ghosts.
1131122211.title: The Mindscape

choices: You decide to stay where you are
You decide to investigate the body
11312.content:
You open up a small cut via a small laser and insert yourself into it as the cut closes behind you. You pull out a data scanner and scan the red walls as a deluge of information comes trailing downwards on the screen about the person you've found.
Medical conditions: Short-sightedness, Aspergers, high immunity, slow digestion, allergies, mild cerebral palsy, small lungs...
You shut the scanner down and decide your next course of action...
11312.title: You Choose Sabrina's Toe (via. a cut) and i...

113122.content: Agent 42 buckles his safety equipment and stares at the screen... There were endless possibilities and so many places to go... But Agent 42 can only choose to be at one location per hour, so he needed to be quick. He stared down the blood vessel with his electric torch and saw how the platelets looked so round and disc-like. Which direction should he venture to?
113122.title: You decide to investigate the body

choices: Use a gadget to climb the desk
1132.content:
"Guess I'll go with old fashion way..." With a few distance away with no one around, Agent 42 pulls out a device that is quite suitable for this mission and press the button, causing the agent to shrink down to an inch. The now inch high agent was able to get under the desk without being spotted, now here comes a hard part: How to reach the desk without being notice...

Agent 42 looks up at one of the tall desk legs, thinking he might climb or use a gadget to scale the leg and reach the computer. However, there is another way to check the computer...By climbing Sabrina and it definitely sounds like a good suicide plan.

With a sigh of annoyance, the tiny agent decided to...
1132.title: Time to Shrink!

choices: Tease Lorelei and ask her a question
Find out information about the hotel
12.content:
Lorelei Banksia is wearing neon shades as she stares at a picture frame, she is a very slim and athletic dark tanned girl with wavy cerulean blue hair. Currently she is posing at a catwalk and she seems eager to please a nervous male photographer who was looking her way with nerdy glasses and a spry expression on his face.

"That's it, turn towards the light." The photographer says right in front of Hotel Constantinople. There was a bellhop in front of the building. Maybe you can sneak past them...
12.title: Choose Lorelei Banksia

choices: Pick up the camera and give it back to the photographer
122.content: You push aside the male photographer as he stumbles and address the surprised Lorelei Banskia as she blinks in the sunlight, her tanned skin being prominent as she stands slack-jawed at your arrival. It occured to you that Lorelei was unaware of your spy status, so what do you decide to do next?
122.title: Ignore the male photographer

choices: Try to sneak into Lorelei's brain and learn what she knows
125.content:
Using a special device provided to you for just this kind of mission, you shrink yourself to an inch in size with one press of a button -- the process is almost instantaneous, and thankfully unnoticed by anyone in the area.

You've got to retrieve that stolen folder. So, what's the plan?
125.title: Shrinkage initiated

choices: Dive into her coffee cup and be swallowed
At night, enter her nose as she sleeps
1252.content: How specifically will you enter Lorelei's body?
1252.title: Other Means of Entry

12521.content:
Through an elaborate series of events and mishaps, you infiltrate Lorelei's bedroom and spot something atop a desk - a coffee cup...

That's it! You decide to dive into Lorelei's coffee and be swallowed, in order to coerce her into telling where that dang folder is.

After a tiring climb, you jump into the brown liquid, immediately feeling the warmth. Just then, you hear the doorknob turning and submerge under the surface of the coffee sea, before someone enters the room.

You feel your world being lifted as you and the coffee are gradually gulped down the thirsty gullet of..,
12521.title: Come on in, the coffee is fine!

choices: "...I thought coffee didn't have pulp...oh well."
125211.content:
You feel your world get lifted as Lorelei begins to gulp down her coffee...and you're about to join it! Unable to fight the brown current, you are soon swallowed along with every last drop of the drink.

As the last of her coffee goes down, Lorelei feels something...odd in her throat.

"Wait a minute..." muses Lorelei.
125211.title: Into Lorelei's Digestive System

choices: Try to give her a stomachache
Look around the stomach for clues
...you didn't plan that far, did you?
1252112.content:
"I thought coffee didn't have pulp...oh well."

Lorelei finishes the coffee and tosses the cup in the trash, oblivious to the tiny agent that had landed in her stomach.

Your eyes adjust to the slightly dark and very slimy prison of flesh you now occupy. So, how do you plan to get the info out of Lorelei?

(Writer's note: Happy Birthday, safire_diaz!)
1252112.title: Inside Lorelei

12521122.content:
Treading your way around the mucky chamber of Lorelei's stomach, you search for clues that might disclose the whereabouts of that dang folder.

What do you eventually find?
12521122.title: Internal Search

choices: Agent 42 looks for more items in there
Agent 42 searches the diagram for clues
125211221.content:
You would find a vanilla envelope in the corners of the large cave-like stomach, it looks quite mouldy and damp from being in there for quite a long time and it says in large waterproof ink, "For your eyes only." Agent 42 uses his handy letter opener to see what way in the envelope, a large diagram would unfold out as there was a large clunk noise as a waterlogged metal device also falls out- along with a smaller item, it was a dictation machine too and a mobile phone.
"Figures that would be handy," Agent 42 grunts as he pockets the two devices before looking at the diagram in question...
125211221.title: A vanilla envelope..?

1252112211.content: You search the envelope for any more useful stuff, and find...
1252112211.title: Any other goodies?

choices: Take a better look at the diagram...
12521122112.content:
As you continue searching the envelope for any useful info, it becomes apparent that nothing else is available to you at the moment.

So, now what?
12521122112.title: What a letdown.

choices: Try to climb up Lorelei's throat
125211221121.content:
You ultimately decide that you can't stay inside Lorelei's stomach. The acid is beginning to bubble and churn, so you retreat to a drier area of your organic prison, sustaining only soaked clothes.

Question is, how do you plan on getting out of here?
125211221121.title: Escape plan

125211222.content: To your own shock, you would find some tiny bones inside the stomach chamber, but if Lorelei's belly was full of bones, that could only mean that others had been here before you had, that or they didn't succeed at their mission. In a panic you would scrabble against the wall before you realise that you can use your gadgets to think your way out of the situation.
125211222.title: Bones?!

1252112221.content:
In a panic after seeing bones, you choose to use your scanner and begin scanning aimlessly inside of Lorelei's stomach. Realizing that this is likely a trap that other spies have fallen into, you nervously and carefully look around and plan for way out. You know something is not right and you choose to abort the mission for now and come up with a different strategy after you are safe.

Your scanner eventually picks up a small electronic device near the bones. You look into it more closely and realize that this is the data you were seeking. You think in your mind: "This is too easy, mission accomplished!". You plug your data recorder into the device to download the secret folder, which only takes a quick second. When you finish copying the files, your heart suddenly drops when you hear a very faint beeping emitting from the device.

Unfortunately, the device was nothing more than a trap with fake data inside. In fact, the device is alerting Lorelei and she is now completely aware that a spy is in her stomach, deliberately trying to spy on her and steal her secrets. Suddenly, you feel her massive body begin to move as you bump against her stomach walls. You hear some noise outside like metal and glass clanking quickly for several minutes.

As you hear these strange noises, you are also trying to think of a way to escape from being digested. There are only two ways, through her esophagus or through her small intestine. You realize that escaping through esophagus by making her throw up is futile, as Lorelei now knows you are trying to escape and you'll never make it out that way. At that same moment as you are looking up at her esophagus, thick, gooey pudding immediately pours into her stomach and plops right on top of you. She devours a couple pounds of it very quickly.

You begin making your way to her small intestine, but you are struggling through the thick, goopey pudding. You realize that this is probably why Lorelei chose to eat pudding, to make it very difficult for you to move through. You feel Lorelei begin to walk and suddenly her entire stomach and everything in it tips over. Lorelei is now lying belly-up on her bed, and pounds of heavy pudding in her stomach have sloshed up on top of you. You begin to panic as you hear Lorelei's stomach begin to gurgle and her stomach acid steadily starts flowing in.

Every muscle in your body is sore and completely exhausted from frantically trying to swim through the thick gooey mass towards her small intestine. You can barely move as the pudding begins to digest and the acid begins to surround you, burning you slightly. However, you almost to her small intestine where you can escape her stomach acid and where you can come up with a new plan. Just as you get near safety, Lorelei begins rubbing her stuffed, tanned belly, causing the walls of her stomach to contract and forcing you to sink deeper and away from your exit.

Out of breath and completely exhausted, you simply cannot move anymore as your muscles are so sore. Lying where you are in the thick, half-digested mass, Lorelei's stomach acid completely engulfs you and you are quickly digested. You do succeed in making it to her small intestine, but only in a new, digested form, leaving behind your skeleton in her stomach along with the others who also made their fatal mistake. Lorelei puts down her own scanner, which she was using all along to track you in her stomach and prevent you from escaping. Now relaxed knowing that the spy (you) are now digested, she widely stretching out her tanned arms and legs, runs her fingers through her blue hair, shifting her weight and stuffed belly, and comfortably lies down for a nap. When Lorelei wakes up, her belly has returned to it's tanned, athletic figure, and your digested remains have become part of her toned abs around her belly.
1252112221.title: You use your scanning device

choices: You decide to book into a motel
You go to a tropical island resort
You go to the Arctic Circle
You decide to go to another country
13.content: You decide to skip the mission and go on a holiday because you deserved a break. On your way to packing your luggage, you stumble across a strange rectangular device that beeps- but you think nothing of it. You pack your suitcase and heft the luggage as you say to Questa-Maria that you will be notified to be gone a short time...
13.title: You decide to go on a holiday

choices: You go out to enjoy the sun
131.content: Agent 42 decided to book into a motel as a chauffeur unloads your luggage for you, which unbeknownst to him contained all the spy gadgetry you'll need for your next mission. You inspect your room carefully for any tapped wires. You decided on what to do next.
131.title: Agent 42 books into a motel

1311.content:
"Man, what is Agent 42 thinking ducking out on work today? Well, that's what I'm gonna find out." Agent 47 said as he waited for Agent 42's luggage to be set down in his motel room. Unbeknownst to Agent 42, Agent 47 shrunk himself down to around an inch and hid himself in Agent 42's luggage in order to keep an eye on him. Now all that was left was to wait until they arrived in his room.


*Thud!* "Here we are mister...I'm sorry, i didn't catch your name?" The bellhop said, wondering who it was he let into the room.


"That's right, you didn't. Now please leave me be." Agent 42 said as he started unpacking. Agent 47 could see the zipper of the bag opening up and hid amongst Agent 42's things. Eventually, he hid himself inside of a...
1311.title: Agent 47

choices: The jeans are placed onto the bed
13111.content: Agent 47 hid inside a pocket on the jeans as the luggage bumped. There was a few seconds interlude and then there was a opening sound as the luggage was unpacked. "Hey, it looks like I forgot something..." Agent 42 murmurs as he gazes at the pile of clothes.
13111.title: Agent 47 hid inside a pocket

choices: Go flying out of the pocket
131112.content: "How could I forget my favorite Polo!?! That one was meant to last!" Said Agent 42 as he tossed the jeans casually onto the bed, rummaging through the luggage. For agent 47, however, it felt anything but casual. Through the (literal) whirlwind of activity, he felt himself slipping out of the jeans. Does he
131112.title: The jeans are placed onto the bed

choices: You manage to hear bits of their conversation
You use your truth-analysing device on Katie
Katie drops an important device and the other man picks it up
You come up to Katie to distract her
You decide to ask your agency about what to do next
14.content:
Katie Madrid happens to be a hip and friendly tanned girl with a brilliant pearly grin as she is wearing a pink and white striped shirt and carries a mobile phone, you check her out but it seems her plaited golden hair is giving you a headache so you use a holographic visor to eliminate the glare.
"Hi there," Katie now waves to an upstart young man as she saunters past him, "Did you get the software analysed by the technicians?" You are startled by this new development as she holds up a microchip with some scanned data so you use something to eavesdrop on them...

You also see Katie put someone small and yelling into her handbag, was it Jared? You wondered?
14.title: Spy on Katie Madrid

145.content:
Using a special communication device, you tune in to get a hold of your superior.

"I need some options," you say, "Katie Madrid just put someone small into her handbag...it sounded like Jared!"

"Not to worry," your boss responds. "Your arsenal should be well-stocked with..."
145.title: Options?

choices: The agent is interrupted by a phone call
Take a sip of your coffee (male)
Take a sip of your coffee (female)
15.content: Agent M42 decided to get a coffee break and carried their cup of coffee over to the coffee machine. There was a short interlude as the coffee machine bubbled and some brown liquid consisting of fine ground, hazel-scented coffee beans were smelled as there was a faint beep.
15.title: You get a coffee instead

choices: A Russian spy is causing trouble...
A rival agency is working on something...
155.content:
Just as M42 was about to sit down and enjoy the coffee, Questa-Maria called him over the intercom.

"Agent M42, please report to the briefing room for an emergency meeting."

M42 groaned as he stood and carried his coffee to the Memphis agency meeting room. The room was just like any other office meeting room, a white walled space with a large wood table in the middle with a dozen or more chairs placed around it. A projector hung from the ceiling aimed at the far wall and a white board to reflect the protection. The only real difference between this room and others like it was the various privacy countermeasures put in built into the room to make it sound proof to any but those inside the closed doors.

In side, Agent M42 found Questa-Maria sitting at the head of the desk looking over a few files that he guested contained the new mission he was about to part take in. The director looked up at him as soon as he entered.

"Good," she said with a touch of urgency, "we need to get started. I have every important mission for you. It could mean the difference between peace and war..."
155.title: New Mission.

choices: Widow is already on the Helicarier...
1551.content:
M42 just shrugged and took his seat. "Alright, what's up?"

Questa-Maria gestured to the projector as she started it up. "You'll be getting your briefing from someone else today. Watch closely."

The projector now turned on, showing the image of a mild aged African-American male with a bald head, beard and an eye patch. M42 recognized him at once. Someone famous in spy circles and feared by all. Director of Shield, Nick Fury. He glanced at Questa who just pointed back to the recording as the image began to move.

"Hello. My name is the Director, Nick Fury. If you're watching this, it means my message had made it to the Memphis agency. Here's the situation. I need your best agent for an important mission. One of my men, Agent codenamed Black Widow has been targeted by a splinter group of A.I.M. This group is intent on gaining all access to the sensitive information Widow has been privy to. Their methods are unknown- and despite my better judgment, I cannot lock Widow away somewhere until we solve this, she is my best agent and an active member of the Avengers. So, I came to you, Questa-Maria."

"The Memphis agency has attained a good reputation as the best of the best in the spy world. You've been credited with the most successful missions in the last year, although none can claim to have seen you in action yet. I ask that you help with this mission. I request that you send your best agents to watch Widow and keep her safe from any immediate threats. If you wish to take the job I'll consider it a personal favor and we will compensate you later. I'll wait for your response."

M42 looked to Questa as the recording cut out. "Are you serious?! You want me to spy on the Black Widow?"

"Yes. If you pull this off, Nick Fury will owe us a favour. Think about what we even could do if we had access to some Shield technology. Plus, this is very important. Black Widow has access to a lots of secret information. Hack into her brain and get it sorted for us so we can have an advantage over others. Anything from inside her can now be a huge asset to us."

"But, what about AIM? It could get very risky if we get involved with them."

"The potential gain outweighs all the risks. You can handle this. I trust you."

M42 just sighed loudly. "Fine. But I'm picking all the equipment for this one. I want to be ready for this mission!"

"Of course..."

Later...
1551.title: A Widow and a Director.

15512.content:
Natasha "Black Widow" Romanova was preening her long red hair as she was checking in her apartment mirror to see if anything was out of place. Her luxurious attire was mainly of black leather as she walked down the hallway elegantly, passing by corridors of other rooms. She picked up a telecommunicator as she was waiting orders from her subordinates. Unknown to Black Widow, a certain parcel had made its way to her letterbox outside the apartment. Smiling, she sauntered down to the main hallway to grab the parcel, unravelling it.

There was an AIM agent nearby outside the apartment as he gazed from his perch far above the high-rise.
"Now I have you, my pretty," He murmured...
15512.title: Back at Widow's apartment...

choices: Black Widow is more relaxed after the battle
155122.content:
Black Widow was on the alert as she headtilts at the suspected spot where the AIM agent would be, as quickly as a spider she would dash to the left. The dart-gun which was loaded missed its target, embedding itself in the nearby wall and shattering a nearby hall-mirror as Black Widow scoffed and sprang into battle, forgetting the parcel in the meantime, which bounces onto the ground as the micro-spy, Agent 42, started wriggling as his world turned topsy turvy for a second.

"You won't catch me that easily!" Black Widow taunts as Agent 42 peeks through the breathing-hole in the brown parcel, seeing a black-high heel where Romonova would normally be standing. Agent 42 waits for an opportunity, but would it come?
155122.title: Black Widow senses trouble

choices: Agent 42 checks out QUAITE Agency's file
Agent 42 decides to wait till after office-hours
Agent 42 thinks about what to do
1552.content: "Right," Questa-Maria responds, sliding a new folder across to Agent M42 as he looked at the folder briefly, "You might have noticed that some competition had started recently between several agencies, and it looks like our secret agency is the target of some of the new rivals. They have been stealing technology from us by sneaking out when the office hours are over, they may have been using the blueprints for a new protocol or invention. Your new job is to find out what they are up to. Else I'd have to find a job elsewhere, or even work as a clerk in Norway, and we can't have that, oh no." The file had the name of the rival agency scrawled onto it: QUAITE Agency.
1552.title: A rival agency is working on something...

choices: I wonder how cold it is in Norway for her...
15523.content: Agent 42 thinks deeply to himself as to what to do..
15523.title: Agent 42 thinks about what to do

155231.content: Agent 42 nods at Questa Maria in comprehension, "I will complete the mission" he proclaims to the lady. Questa Maria nods, "Now go, the fate of this agency relies on you." Agent 42 goes to the building
155231.title: Agent 42 agrees

choices: The mission continues without a hitch.
1552311.content:
The plain glass doors leading to the lobby of the Qwaite building slid apart from one another. a tall women proudly struts on through the sounds of her heels clopping against the marble floor echo through the building surrounding the office workers rushing around. As the women finishes entering the door the guard that stood beside it straightens his uniform "your highness" he says as he bends slightly. The women lets out a slight smile and continues to walk towards the main desk as if it was a cat walk. the women was tall, with paled skin and wrapped in an elegant robe that proclaimed aloud dignity yet seduction. The dress accentuated her figure wrapping itself closely to her figure, adorning the woman in a fragrant pearl white that's highlighted by the golden highlights that ran through her attire. The dress slightly grazing the floor in a soft swaying motion. she continued to walk towards the desk worker gently brushing her red scarlet hair to one side as she does the light catches her magnificent jewellery that lay bare across her neck becoming the only bridge between her neck and chest. the diamond entangled necklace glistened under the hard light that covered the floor above.

the women had reached her destination and towered over the receptionist who sat there typing away. "ahem" the lady cleared her throat in a dignified way placing her hand across her chest slightly covering her soft silky chest exposing a majestic crystal gem that rested upon a ring on her hand. the receptionist glanced up towards her locking eyes with her, he stepped away from his desk and rose up to meet her. "your highness, we wasn't expecting you to..." he rambled in haste realising his negligence. in a panic he outstretched his arm for a handshake. The women just looked at his hand with distant towards it. the man now realising his mistake withdrew his hand instead using it to direct the women in front of him. "right this way, your highness" the man stammered now trying to avoid eye contact. the women continued her walk of confidence towards the elevator beside her. As she stood there she raised her right hand towards the elevators sensor scanning in her gleaming gem that lay atop her hand. with that the machine beeped in response and the door opened before her. The man signalled her to enter and she complied tuning around to face the door as its cold steel doors slammed shut and the elevator began to rise upwards.

the women let out a deep breath the jewellery across her neck dangling as she does so. "im in " she proclaims aloud. Maria's voice can be heard via an ear piece implanted within her ear."that was quite the entrance, your highness?" maria mockingly asked. "well you now me, i do have a thing for the unorthodox" the women replied as she brush her necklace correcting its position, now slightly exposing the tops of her breasts that were accentuated by the pearl and gold that smothered her skin. "time check agent 42, you are running behind schedule." Maria reminded her. The woman now inspecting her reflection once more re-positioned her dress lifting her breasts upwards slightly. " don't worry i'm on schedule, besides im enjoying this" the women said calmly to Maria over the ear piece. "agent 42 this is mission critical. we've just received reports that the real princess Aria is on route to the Qwaite building" Maria said with haste. "don't worry, if it comes to it ill find someone else to morph into. besides the nano machines are holding up fine, no one suspects anything" he boasted confidently. "very well then agent 42, begin operation royal pain" Maria commanded.
1552311.title: He enters the Qwaite Building

choices: Agent 42 makes it back to hq and meets with Maria.
15523111.content: Agent 42 exited the elevator and hastily made his way towards the main server room. He charged towards the main column left unguarded in his new feminine form, his new high heels painfully blistering his feet as he hastened his pace. quickly checking the room around him he b leaned over and began the facial scan. "ID confirmed. welcome princess Aria" the computer said out loud. as the doors magnetic lock released agent 42 walked inside and undone a hidden usb from within his crystal diamond necklace. quickly he plugged it into the serve and began the transfer "Transfer complete" the machine declared aloud. before anyone had time to notice what was going on agent 42 had already made his way back into the lobby and rushing through the front door all whilst the receptionist from earlier attempted to apologise to "her".
15523111.title: The mission continues without a hitch.

choices: The two Aria's continue there little conversation.
155231111.content:
Maria sat alone in a dimly lit room waiting for agent 42 to return. The door slammed open as agent 42 entered the room still disguised as princess Aria, agent 42 throws the usb across the table towards Maria. "excellent work agent 42, no one was none the wiser" she proudly proclaimed. "you can thank these nano machines for that, with tech like this anyone can morph into anyone else, hell maybe even anything!" he exclaimed. " im well aware" maria explained as she slowly began to morph into an alternate version of princess Aria. Maria's clothes and form began to morph into a darkened version of princess Aria now sporting a full black dress with matching cloak that was amplified by the contrasting purples and green than covered various parts of the dress. The dress now left the "newer" Princess Aria's midriff bare and exposed.

The newly formed princess Aria too sported black hair that only came down to her neck filled with vivid green highlights. The two of them now practically identical only there outfits and the faint green mascara on Maria's Aria separated the two. "you see 42, if you left your ego at the door every morning maybe you too wouldn't need a photo to reference" Maria said in a smug fashion. "well, now you've got my attention" agent 42 replied now filled with excitement as too what possibilities this may lead too.
155231111.title: Agent 42 makes it back to hq and meets with Maria.

155231112.content: The satellite beeps as the other agencies had detected the breach, Agent 74 is on patrol on the area as 'Princess Aria' must stay clear of her.
155231112.title: they've detected the breach.

choices: He decided to look at the work files
155232.content:
Agent 42 decides to pour himself a latte coffee. As he slid the coffee mug under the coffee machine, it chugged and poured a dollop of cream and thick brown coffee. Agent 42 partook of the coffee as he sipped and gazed at his digital watch idly. Then he heard a ding. It was the coffee timer. He decided to get back to work immediately. So he set the coffee mug down.
"Back to work," he grunted
155232.title: Coffee then work!

choices: Shrink and find the other missing people
Sneak into Ellarinne Enterprises and investigate what they're doing
1553.content:
"...a series of mysterious disappearances have been going on."

"Disappearances?" Agent M42 questions. "What kind of disappearances?"

"Our sources tell us that the disappearances are caused by this company called Ellarinne Enterprises," Questa-Maria answered. "They sell shrunken people encased in plastic pills." She pulls out one of the pills the odd company sells. In it is a tiny, panicked woman. This woman has long brown hair, brown eyes, a white t-shirt, capri pants, and Asian eyes.

"Geez," said Agent M42. "It's like a Mighty Beanz prison."

"This is Haruhi Zamboni, one of the missing people," Questa-Maria tells him. "We're still trying to find out how to free her from the pill. Although, returning her to normal size should be easy; all we need to do is switch the shrink ray to reverse."

"So, is there anything I can do?" Agent M42 asked.
1553.title: The Disappearance of Haruhi Zamboni and others

info.brief_description: A super spy investigates weird info while collecting data from other local agencies
info.description:
A spy is shrunk, designed to infiltrate other agents in order to intercept information from other agencies. 2600 gp with each chapter

Rules:
Keep it PG and the people must be unaware of the secret agent. Detailed sentences at least a paragraph long.
No sex-scenes, no foot-play, waterplay or scat. The main emphasis is on spy agencies and the transference of several important items from missions that are carried from many agencies which your character must interfere. with. In the wrong hands these items can be dangerous information for the agencies involved.

The main rule is be discreet and respect others
The other thing is this is more about exploring and a parody of most espionage movies like Mission Impossible, so keep it full tour, endo-centric and comedic.
The agencies must keep in touch via satellite. Female agents are also allowed... Now with 27 chapters! Birthday special, don't miss out.
